page.title: 16EXLEY AREA
page.content: Housing - There is a housing estate of over one hundred semi-detached houses in the North/West corner of square AA Otherwise it is largely rural. Religion- In the South East corner os AA there is Park Wood Crematorium with a garden of rest serving the township of Elland. Land Use -This area is predominantly rural in character. This farming land being given over to pasture. The relatively steep valley sides make arable farming inpractical. There is a considerable area of mixed deciduous and coniferous woodland along the steepest parts of the valley side. Education - To the South of Exley housing estate is Exley County Secondary School with playing fields, tennis courts and also cricket ground used by Siddal Cricket Club.
